review: This is a pretty worthless item.  Why would anyone want to use this since it will not let you use all of the apps on your mobile device?  You are limited to the apps that Google is getting paid to let you view.  If you want a device that lets you watch all of the items on Chromecast and hundreds more and doesn't require the use of a mobile device, buy a Roku Stick.  I purchased a Chromecast when it first became available and have never used it because it is a pretty stupid idea.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works okay, but watching can be frustrating as there are interruptions to data streaming due to natural wi-fi issues.  this can cause pixelation and stalling.  I just stopped using it and went back to the old fashioned way...an HDMI cable.

review: Look at Chromecast as a cable replacement which streams ONLY your Chrome browser to your TV.You can achieve the same, and much more, with an HDMI cable.if you can place your laptop next to your TV and use a cable, you are much better of than using Chromecast.
